name: Shoot The Promoter
description:
It's a simple endless wave-based shooter. The game was made for education purposes. But I will be pleased if you leave your opinion about the project bellow  (*^▽^*) 

---Controllers---

WASD - walking

C - Crouch

Left mouse button - Shoot

Right mouse button - Aim

Mouse -Look

Left Shift - Run

F - Interact
